Uses of Package
net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.meta

  • Packages that use net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.meta 
    Package Description
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl
    The PluginManagerFactory is the framework's entry point and the only class of relevance within this package, start exploring here.
  • Classes in net.xeoh.plugins.base.annotations.meta used by net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl 
    Class and Description
    Author
    Specifies an author of the given plugin.
    RecognizesOption
    Specifies the given method does accept and evaluate a given parameter.

    Work in progress, annotation will change! Also, it is not being evaluated at the moment.
    Stateless
    Marker interface to signal that JSPF may hot swap the component behind the scenes without causing trouble to existing components.

    Not functional right now!

    TODO: Does it make really sense / do we *really* want such a functionality? It complicates many things and is only relevant to a small number of projects (which are likely better off with OSGi and the like)
    Version
    Version of the given plugin.
